Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Recombinant Cytokine/Recombinant Chemokine/Recombinant Alpha Chemokine/Recombinant Beta Thromboglobulin
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A therapeutic analogue of an endogenous, platelet-specific protein that is a member of the alpha chemokine family. Beta thromboglobulin may be used as a marker for platelet activation. (NCI04)
